subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Johnson shot a 69 for a nine-under par 279 total to secure his ninth PGA Tour victory, and his first since he won another W.G.C. event, in China, in 2013.
snippet: Johnson shot a 69 for a nine-under par 279 total to secure his ninth PGA Tour victory, and his first since he won another W.G.C. event, in China, in 2013.
